select holidayId, employeeId, createdBy, updatedBy, holidayDesc, holidayDateInString, isExchangeDay, createDateInString, updateDateInString, employeeCode, employeeName, isDeleted, holidayType, holidayTypeName from( select hol.holidayId as holidayId, hol.employeeId as employeeId, hol.createdBy as createdBy, hol.updatedBy as updatedBy, hol.holidayDesc as holidayDesc, hol.holidayDateInString as holidayDateInString, hol.isExchangeDay as isExchangeDay, hol.createDateInString as createDateInString, hol.updateDateInString as updateDateInString, hol.employeeCode as employeeCode, hol.employeeName as employeeName, hol.isDeleted as isDeleted, hol.holidayType as holidayType, hol.holidayTypeName as holidayTypeName, ROWNUM rnum from( SELECT P.HOLIDAY_ID as holidayId, P.EMPLOYEE_ID as employeeId, P.CREATED_BY as createdBy, P.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, P.HOLIDAY_DESC as holidayDesc, TO_CHAR(P.HOLIDAY_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') as holidayDateInString, P.IS_EXCHANGE_DAY as isExchangeDay, P.CREATE_DATE as createDateInString, P.UPDATE_DATE as updateDateInString, (SELECT employee_code FROM employee WHERE employee_id = p.employee_id) as employeeCode, (SELECT employee_name FROM employee WHERE employee_id = p.employee_id) as employeeName, IS_DELETED as isDeleted, P.HOLIDAY_TYPE as holidayType, fGetGeneralCodeCaption(P.HOLIDAY_TYPE) as holidayTypeName FROM PERSONAL_HOLIDAY P JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON P.EMPLOYEE_ID = E.EMPLOYEE_ID where IS_DELETED = 0
TO_CHAR(P.HOLIDAY_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') >= #searchValue#
AND TO_CHAR(P.HOLIDAY_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') <= #searchValue2#
ORDER BY P.HOLIDAY_DATE) hol where ROWNUM <= #end#) where rnum >= #begin#

SELECT P.HOLIDAY_ID as holidayId, P.EMPLOYEE_ID as employeeId, P.CREATED_BY as createdBy, P.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, HOLIDAY_DESC as holidayDesc, TO_CHAR(HOLIDAY_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') as holidayDateInString, IS_EXCHANGE_DAY as isExchangeDay, P.CREATE_DATE as createDateInString, P.UPDATE_DATE as updateDateInString, P.IS_DELETED as isDeleted, E.EMPLOYEE_CODE as employeeCode, E.EMPLOYEE_NAME as employeeName, P.HOLIDAY_TYPE as holidayType, fGetGeneralCodeCaption(P.HOLIDAY_TYPE) as holidayTypeName FROM PERSONAL_HOLIDAY P JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON P.EMPLOYEE_ID = E.EMPLOYEE_ID where HOLIDAY_ID = #holId#
sqlMap.insert: insert into PERSONAL_HOLIDAY(HOLIDAY_ID, EMPLOYEE_ID, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_BY, HOLIDAY_DESC, HOLIDAY_DATE, IS_EXCHANGE_DAY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, IS_DELETED, HOLIDAY_TYPE) VALUES (#holidayId#, #employeeId#, #createdBy#, NULL, #holidayDesc#, TO_DATE(#holidayDateInString#,'yyyy-MM-dd'), #isExchangeDayInt#, SYSDATE, NULL, 0, #holidayType#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT HOLIDAY_ID as holidayId, EMPLOYEE_ID as employeeId, CREATED_BY as createdBy, UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, HOLIDAY_DESC as holidayDesc, TO_CHAR(HOLIDAY_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') as holidayDateInString, IS_EXCHANGE_DAY as isExchangeDay, CREATE_DATE as createDateInString, UPDATE_DATE as updateDateInString, IS_DELETED as isDeleted, P.HOLIDAY_TYPE as holidayType, fGetGeneralCodeCaption(P.HOLIDAY_TYPE) as holidayTypeName FROM PERSONAL_HOLIDAY where HOLIDAY_ID = #value# ORDER BY HOLIDAY_ID
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PERSONAL_HOLIDAY SET HOLIDAY_ID=#holidayId#, EMPLOYEE_ID=#employeeId#, UPDATED_BY=#updatedBy#, HOLIDAY_DESC=#holidayDesc#, HOLIDAY_DATE=to_date(#holidayDateInString#,'yyyy-MM-dd'), IS_EXCHANGE_DAY=#isExchangeDayInt#, UPDATE_DATE=SYSDATE, HOLIDAY_TYPE=#holidayType# WHERE HOLIDAY_ID=#holidayId#
update PERSONAL_HOLIDAY SET IS_DELETED = 1, UPDATED_BY = #updatedBy#, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE HOLIDAY_ID=#holidayId# AND IS_DELETED=0
